function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via respiratory droplets and fomites","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 and potential for outbreaks","Mitigation":"Use of masks, proper ventilation, and disinfection of surfaces","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, and contactless technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in sewage and potential for health risks to workers","Impact":"Health risks to workers exposed to wastewater","Mitigation":"Implementation of sewage surveillance and proper protective measures","Technologies":"Sewage testing kits, personal protective equipment","People":"Workers exposed to wastewater, sewage treatment staff","Owner":"Public health agencies, environmental agencies, sewage treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Increas in virus load in sewer systems due to circulation of the virus in the population","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission through sewage","Mitigation":"Monitoring and control of virus load in sewer systems, education on proper hygiene and sanitation practices","Technologies":"Sewage monitoring systems, public education campaigns","People":"General public, sewage treatment staff","Owner":"Public health agencies, environmental agencies, city authorities"}]}
